name: Tales of Alternia (DEMO)
description:
Tez wakes after a month in a coma. With no idea who he is or where he is.

He must travel Alternia meeting new allies and dangerous enemies to recover his lost memories.  In an adventure that has the fate of Alternia and more at stake!

Features:  Unique storyline

Special Field skills as in Weather Control and Stealth.

Enemy Weakness

Ultimate Moves
